item.title: “EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) is now open and accepting applications from Japanese universities.（application deadline: February 16th, 2026）
Information on the researchers invited under “EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) has been released.
The universities selected for “EXPERT-J” (“EXcellence Program for Engaging Research Talent – Japan”) have been finalized.
